original_text: And the bow shall be in the cloud; and I will look upon it, that I may remember the everlasting covenant between God and every living creature of all flesh that is upon the earth.
korean_text: 무지개가 구름 사이에 있으리니 내가 보고 나 하나님과 모든 육체를 가진 땅의 모든 생물 사이의 영원한 언약을 기억하리라

sentences.original_text: And the bow shall be in the cloud
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 활이 구름 속에 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will look upon it
that I may remember the everlasting covenant
between God and every living creature
of all flesh that is upon the earth
